author: gsaha009
body:
#### PR description:

Following the last PR #36557, the miniAOD validation is prepared for MC for Run3. This reorganization follows the discussions mentioned below:

- [Proposal of new DQM setup - Aniello Spiezia](https://indico.cern.ch/event/860836/contributions/3628014/attachments/1938401/3213048/AnielloSpiezia_041119.pdf) 
- [Tau DQM Sequence Review - Gage DeZoort & Ece Asilar](https://indico.cern.ch/event/870363/contributions/3670599/attachments/1975330/3287515/Tau_DQM_SequenceReview_Jan21st.pdf)
- [Offline DQM Validation Developments from Tau POG - Ece Asilar](https://indico.cern.ch/event/1186647/contributions/4986214/attachments/2487598/4271494/PPDWorshop.pdf)

Related Twiki page: https://twiki.cern.ch/twiki/bin/viewauth/CMS/SWGuidePFTauIDValidation

#### Latest changes:
 - The configs in `Validation.RecoTau.datatypes` use `ak4GenJets` and `genParticles` like before to allow the validation steps run successfully on RECO, if necessary.
 - All the requirements for the MiniAOD validation is now cloned into `Validation.RecoTau.RecoTauValidation_cff`
 - The generator level tau decay mode finding algorithm is now modified: need discussion! 

#### PR validation:

- PR runs fine in local pipeline
- Tests done with workflow: 

  - 14034.0
  - new tests: 5.1, 135.4, 2018.1, 24034.0, 250205.18, 250408.17, 500205.0

title: Tau DQM miniAOD validation for MC
